org.efaps.admin.user

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.admin.AbstractAdminObject
      • org.efaps.admin.user.AbstractUserObject
        • org.efaps.admin.user.Person
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, CacheObjectInterface

    public final class Person
extends AbstractUserObject
    Class represents the instance of a person/user in eFaps.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFasp Team
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Enum for all known and updated attributes from a person.

    • Method Detail

      • hasChildPerson

        public boolean hasChildPerson(Person _person)
        Checks, if the given person is assigned to this user object. Here it is only tested if the person is the same as the user of the parameter.
        Specified by:
        hasChildPerson in class AbstractUserObject
        Parameters:
        _person - person to test
        Returns:
        true if the person is the same person as this person, otherwise false
        See Also:
        #persons, #getPersons

        public boolean isAssigned(Role _role)
        Tests, if the given role is assigned to this person.
        Parameters:
        _role - role to test
        Returns:
        true if role is assigned to this person, otherwise false

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        All assigned roles in roles and groups in groups are removed in the cache from this person instance. This is needed if the person assignments are rebuild (e.g. from a login servlet).

      • getAttrValue

        public String getAttrValue(Person.AttrName _attrName)
        Returns for given attribute name the value in the cache.
        Parameters:
        _attrName - name of attribute for which the value must returned
        Returns:
        attribute value of given attribute name

        public Locale getLocale()
        Method to get the Locale of this Person. Default is the "English" Locale.
        Returns:

        public String getLanguage()
        Method to get the Language of the UserInterface for this Person. Default is english.
        Returns:
        iso code of a language

      • updateAttrValue

        public void updateAttrValue(Person.AttrName _attrName,
                   String _value)
        Updates a value for an attribute in the cache and marks then as modified. Only after calling method commitAttrValuesInDB() the updated attribute value is stored in the database!
        Parameters:
        _attrName - name of attribute to update
        _value - new value to set directly

      • updateAttrValue

        public void updateAttrValue(Person.AttrName _attrName,
                   String _value,
                   String _updateValue)
        Updates a value for an attribute in the cache and marks then as modified. Only after calling method commitAttrValuesInDB() the updated attribute value is stored in the database!
        Parameters:
        _attrName - name of attribute to update
        _value - new value to set directly
        _updateValue - new value to be set in the database
        See Also:
        attrUpdated, attrValues

      • commitAttrValuesInDB

        public void commitAttrValuesInDB()
                          throws EFapsException
        Commits update attribute defined in attrUpdated with method updateAttrValue(org.efaps.admin.user.Person.AttrName, java.lang.String) to the database. After database update, attrUpdated is cleared.
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
        See Also:
        attrUpdated, attrValues, updateAttrValue(org.efaps.admin.user.Person.AttrName, java.lang.String)

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(String _passwd)
                      throws EFapsException
        The instance method checks if the given password is the same password as the password in the database.
        Parameters:
        _passwd - password to check for this person
        Returns:
        true if password is correct, otherwise false
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if query for the password check failed

      • setPassword

        public Update.Status setPassword(String _newPasswd)
                          throws EFapsException
        The instance method sets the new password for the current context user. Before the new password is set, some checks are made.
        Parameters:
        _newPasswd - new Password to set
        Returns:
        true if password set, else false
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

                   throws EFapsException
        The instance method reads all information from the database.
        Throws:

        See Also:
        readFromDBAttributes()

      • getAssociationsFromDB

        public Set<Association> getAssociationsFromDB(JAASSystem _jaasSystem)
                                       throws EFapsException
        The method reads directly from the database all stored Association for this person. The found Association are returned as instance of Set.
        Parameters:
        _jaasSystem - JAAS system for which the roles must get from eFaps (if value is null, all companies independent from the related JAAS system are returned)
        Returns:
        set of all found Association for given JAAS system
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • getCompaniesFromDB

        public Set<Company> getCompaniesFromDB(JAASSystem _jaasSystem)
                                throws EFapsException
        The method reads directly from the database all stored companies for this person. The found roles are returned as instance of Set.
        Parameters:
        _jaasSystem - JAAS system for which the roles must get from eFaps (if value is null, all companies independent from the related JAAS system are returned)
        Returns:
        set of all found companies for given JAAS system
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • setCompanies

        public void setCompanies(JAASSystem _jaasSystem,
                Set<Company> _companies)
                  throws EFapsException
        The depending roles for the user are set for the given JAAS system. All roles are added to the loaded roles in the cache of this person.
        Parameters:
        _jaasSystem - JAAS system for which the roles are set
        _companies - set of company to set for the JAAS system
        Throws:
        EFapsException - from calling methods

      • getRolesFromDB

        public Set<Role> getRolesFromDB()
                         throws EFapsException
        The method reads directly from the database all stores roles for the this person. The found roles are returned as instance of Set .
        Returns:
        set of all found roles for all JAAS systems
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
        See Also:
        getRolesFromDB(JAASSystem);

      • getRolesFromDB

        public Set<Role> getRolesFromDB(JAASSystem _jaasSystem)
                         throws EFapsException
        The method reads directly from the database all stores roles for the this person. The found roles are returned as instance of Set .
        Parameters:
        _jaasSystem - JAAS system for which the roles are searched in eFaps (if value is null, all roles independent from the related JAAS system are returned)
        Returns:
        set of all found roles for given JAAS system
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • setRoles

        public void setRoles(JAASSystem _jaasSystem,
            Set<Role> _roles)
              throws EFapsException
        The depending roles for the user are set for the given JAAS system. All roles are added to the loaded roles in the cache of this person.
        Parameters:
        _jaasSystem - JAAS system for which the roles are set
        _roles - set of roles to set for the JAAS system
        Throws:
        EFapsException - from calling methods
        See Also:
        assignRoleInDb(org.efaps.admin.user.JAASSystem, org.efaps.admin.user.Role), unassignRoleInDb(org.efaps.admin.user.JAASSystem, org.efaps.admin.user.Role)

      • getGroupsFromDB

        public Set<Group> getGroupsFromDB(JAASSystem _jaasSystem)
                           throws EFapsException
        The method reads directly from eFaps all stored groups for the this person. The found groups are returned as instance of Set.
        Parameters:
        _jaasSystem - JAAS system for which the groups must fetched from eFaps (if value is null, all groups independent from the related JAAS system are returned)
        Returns:
        set of all found groups for given JAAS system
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • setGroups

        public void setGroups(JAASSystem _jaasSystem,
             Set<Group> _groups)
               throws EFapsException
        The depending groups for the user are set for the given JAAS system. All groups are added to the loaded groups in the cache of this person.
        Parameters:
        _jaasSystem - JAAS system for which the roles are set
        _groups - set of groups to set for the JAAS system
        Throws:
        EFapsException - from calling methods
        See Also:
        assignGroupInDb(JAASSystem, Group), unassignGroupInDb(JAASSystem, Group)

      • getWithJAASKey

        public static Person getWithJAASKey(JAASSystem _jaasSystem,
                    String _jaasKey)
                             throws EFapsException
        Returns for given parameter _jaasKey the instance of class Person. The parameter _jaasKey is the name of the person used in the given JAAS system for the person.
        Parameters:
        _jaasSystem - JAAS system for which the JAAS key is named
        _jaasKey - key in the foreign JAAS system for which the person is searched
        Returns:
        instance of class Person, or null if person is not found
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error
        See Also:
        get(long)

      • createPerson

        public static Person createPerson(JAASSystem _jaasSystem,
                  String _jaasKey,
                  String _userName)
                           throws EFapsException
        Parameters:
        _jaasSystem - JAAS system which want to create a new person in eFaps
        _jaasKey - key of the person in the JAAS system
        _userName - name in the eFaps system (used as proposal, it's tested for uniqueness and changed if needed!)
        Returns:
        new created person
        Throws:
        EFapsException - if person could not be created in eFaps
        See Also:
        AbstractUserObject.assignToJAASSystem(org.efaps.admin.user.JAASSystem, java.lang.String)
